definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: The workload is big. Are gel pens used?
sentences.chinese: 這工作量很大啊。都是用中性筆？
